column3: Select one or more archiving services

column4: You can select more than one and the URL box appears

column3: Select 'The journal content isn't archived...' option

column4: The others deselect and become inactive
Other archiving policy  and URL boxes appear

column3: Scroll to the bottom and press Next

column4: You see an error message telling you that the Other box must be filled in

column3: Fill in all the other questions and click Next

column4: You are taken to the Review page
